      • convertString

        public java.lang.CharSequence convertString(java.lang.CharSequence line,
                                            java.lang.CharSequence delimiter)
        Looks at a CharSequence, splits it by the delimiter and than replaces all tokens which are keys in {code converter}
        Parameters:
        line - The line to be changed
        delimiter - The chars by which the line will be split
        Returns:
        The changed line
